metaselection 0.1.0
  • Reference
    • P-Value Selection Models for Meta-Analysis with Dependent Effects

Package index

Selection Model

Functions to fit and evaluate selection models with RVE and cluster bootstrapping

selection_model()
Estimate step or beta selection model
selection_plot()
Plot the selection weights implied by an estimated selection model.
selection_wts()
Calculate model-implied weights for specified p-values.
print(<selmodel>)
Print results from selmodel()
summary(<selmodel>)
Summarize results from selmodel()

Data Generation

Functions to generate meta-analytic data with options options to simulate selective outcome reporting

r_meta()
Generate meta-analytic data
step_fun()
Censor meta-analytic dataset based on a step-function model
beta_fun()
Censor meta-analytic dataset based on the beta-density model model
n_ES_empirical()
Simulate empirical distribution of sample size and number of effect sizes
n_ES_param()
Simulate empirical distribution of sample size and number of effect sizes

Example Datasets

Two example datasets from real meta-analyses and one dataset containing distribution of sample sizes and effect sizes

self_control
Self-Control Training Meta-Analysis
interleaved_learning
Interleaved Learning Meta-Analysis
wwc_es
What Works Clearinghouse sample size and effect size distribution data
